_header: Saint Bernard sayeth and so say I
_description: On the Evils of Backbiting — eighteen quatrains

BLRoy18Ax.First Lines:
SEynt Bernard seiþ and so seye IIn her counseill come not my
                    sowle…
BLRoy18Ax.Last Lines:
…And þus seiþ cryst in hys godspellÞat worde
                    schal saue eueryche man or spille
